name: Mendel90
pre_gcode: M140 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0} ; set the bed temperature and continue on
G1 X-50 Y98 F9000 ;go to the left of the top
G1 Z0.05 ; close to the bed
M104 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0}; pre-heat the extruder continue on
M190 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0} ;set the bed temp & wait
M109 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0};set the extruder temp for layer 0 & wait
G1 X50 E10 F300 ; make a thick line to prime extruder
post_gcode: M140 S0 ;heated bed heater off (if you have it)
G1 E-1 F1200 ;retract the filament a bit before lifting the nozzle, to release some of the pressure
G1 Z200 X-100 F9000 ; go to top
G1 Y100 F5000 ;Move Y to back
M42 P42 S255 ;Turn on Bed cooling fan on
M42 P42 S0 ;Turn off bed cooling fan
